org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.attachment
Class AeFileAttachmentStorage

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.attachment.AeFileAttachmentStorage
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeAttachmentStorage
public class AeFileAttachmentStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeAttachmentStorage

Implements an attachment storage that stores the contents of attachments in temporary files.

Nested Class Summary
protected static class AeFileAttachmentStorage.AeAttachmentInfo
          Defines a simple struct of attachment information.
protected static class AeFileAttachmentStorage.AeLongCounter
          Implements a simple counter.
